<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Beastmaster Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=6272) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 189 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Beastmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=241), [Undead Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=176) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
[Mature Beastmaster Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=6269)

</column>

---

Your mature animal companions continue to grow and develop. Each of them becomes a nimble or savage animal companion, gaining additional capabilities determined by the type of companion. You choose nimble or savage individually for each companion, including any companion that becomes mature after you take this feat.

<title level="2">Incredible Beastmaster Companion leads to...</title>
[Specialized Beastmaster Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=6275)
name: Incredible Beastmaster Companion
